Chapters

DirTraverser

Recursively scans through directories searching for form definition files, and parses those that it finds.

Summary
DirTraverser
Recursively scans through directories searching for form definition files, and parses those that it finds.
Properties
$settings
An array with settings.
$gen
A Generator instance used to parse form definitions.
$total
A total count of form files processed Property: $failed A count of how many form files failed to compile
Functions
__construct
removeDoubleSlash
Changes double slashes in paths to a single one, for aesthetic purposes.
doTraverse
Processes a single directory.
traverse
Traverses the directory structure pointed at in the settings.
compileFile
Generates code for a single form description file.

Properties

$settings

An array with settings.

$gen

A Generator instance used to parse form definitions.

$total

A total count of form files processed Property: $failed A count of how many form files failed to compile

Functions

__construct

public function __construct($settings)

Parameters

$settingsThe settings for the traverser.

Settings

Valid settings for the traverser are:

baseDirThe directory at which to start scanning.
fileMaskThe filemask that identifies form definition files.
classDirThe directory relative to the form file where class files will be written.
classNameThe name of the generated classes.  The filenames are based on this as well.
htmlDirThe directory relative to the form file where HTML files will be written.
htmlHeadDirThe directory relative to the form file where HTML header files will be written.  If not specified, the header will be written in the normal HTML file.
actionDirThe directory relative to the form file where action files will be written.
actionFilesAn array of files that perform display and/or actions.  The key is the name of the PHP template file, the value is the name of the generated file.
templateDirThe directory where the PHP templates can be found.

The generated filenames classFile and actionFiles have a few format specifiers:

%OThe object name as specified in a form template.
%oThe object name with the first letter converted to lowercase.
%AThe action name starting with a capital.
%aThe action name starting with a lowercase letter.

removeDoubleSlash

protected function removeDoubleSlash($s)

Changes double slashes in paths to a single one, for aesthetic purposes.

doTraverse

protected function doTraverse($baseDir,
$mask,
$callback)

Processes a single directory.  Any subdirectories that are found are processed recursively, and any files that match the filemask are compiled via the callback function.

traverse

public function traverse()

Traverses the directory structure pointed at in the settings.  Any encountered form definition files are compiled.

compileFile

protected function compileFile($filename)

Generates code for a single form description file.  If anything goes wrong while processing, a notice is printed.
Generated by Natural Docs
This class writes the actual PHP and HTML code for a given form description.
